About the Company: Sapan Chemicals Ltd is a Baroda-based public limited company, Suryadeep Salt Refinery and Chemical Works was incorporated in Feb.`95. It is promoted by Rajendrasinh Rathod, S P Srivastava and S G Bhagwat. The company is setting up a project at Jamnagar, Gujarat, to manufacture refined iodised salt and drinking water as by-product with an installed capacity of 19,800 tpa and 4,95,00,000 ltr pa respectively.
